tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_profiles (
    profile_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR,
    handle VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE customer_interactions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    profile_id UUID,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE response_templates (
    template_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR,
    template_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE posts ( 
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  account_id INT, 
  post_content TEXT, 
  post_date TIMESTAMP, 
  CONSTRAINT fk_account_id FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES social_media_accounts(account_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE responses ( 
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  request_id INT, 
  response_content TEXT, 
  response_date TIMESTAMP, 
  CONSTRAINT fk_request_id FOREIGN KEY (request_id) REFERENCES customer_requests(request_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  customer_email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  social_media_handles JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE conversations (
  conversation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  agent_id INT,
  start_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  end_datetime TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE messages (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  conversation_id INT,
  sender VARCHAR(50),
  message_text TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  agent_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  priority INT
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ticket_id INT,
  response_text TEXT,
  response_datetime TIMESTAMP
)
